testimonials.text: Simba is a strong and creative individual, has shown an interest in front end development
An intelligent person whose very creative and always thinking out the box. He gives ideas lots of thought and always determined to complete a task or to reach his goal
Simbarashe is a critical thinker, an excellent problem-solver and concise individual. His passionate and his work is remarkable. It would be a great asset to have him to be part of your team

Simba is a very charismatic,  energetic  and hardworking individual. He is very  enthusiastic and he works well with others and he always seems to light up the room with his personality.Simba is focused on achieving all his goals.There is never a dull moment with him.I believe Simba will be an asset to the company and he will definitely bring something different.
